attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what Trump 2020 was all about. I immediately noticed spam mail in my email account, spam calls, and spam notifications after I downloaded the app. I genuinely believe that this app could ruin my phone or other people phones. I would not recommend this app to anyone with a phone they would like to keep. Also immediately after I deleted the app, all of the spam mail and notifications where completely gone and off my phone. This app should be deleted from the Apple App Store.
